flawed_nl_solution:
She bought 2 pounds of hamburger meat at $3.5 per pound so 2*3.5 = $<<2*3.5=7>>7
The tomato weighed 1.5 pounds and cost $2 per pound so 1.5*2 = $<<1.5*2=3>>3
When you add up all her items she spent 7+1.5+1+3+2.5=$<<7+1.5+1+3+2.5=11>>11
Her items added up to $11 and she had a $1 coupon off pickles so 11-1 = $<<11-1=10>>10
She paid with a $20 bill so 20-10 = $<<20-10=10>>10 in change
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
